reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bad acne!
reviews.reviewText: I have moderate-to-severe acne on my face, chest, and back. My dermatologist recommended using this in the shower as a daily face and body wash, and it has worked better than any prescription medication I've tried for acne over the last 10+ years. It is drying, so I make sure to use moisturizer afterwards, but I noticed my acne improve within a month of daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works!
reviews.reviewText: Works well for underarm odors that cannot be resolved with deodorant. The product was light and did not leave residue. Product did the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product but…
reviews.reviewText: TikTok influenced me to buy this product after a deep dive into new products for new skincare concerns. I had used a benzoyl peroxide gel in high school so I was familiar with it already. I love what this has done for my skin but it took some trial and error to perfect a regimen. I found that using this cleaner every other day provides good results without drying out my cheeks. No scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for severe acne
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product for me but it’s definitely very strong stuff. It also discolored the wash cloth I used with it, so you have to be careful not to get it on anything fabric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion was strongly recommended for our sons skin problem!! Doesn’t require much for the application so it lasts a long time! Results have been great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Antes de comprarlo leí muchas opiniones de que el pote les llegaba a mitad y sin sellar. Les cuento que me di la tarea de pesarlo rápido que lo recibí por que si estaba a mitad y peso 5 onzas tal como lo dice en la etiqueta, osea que tiene la cantidad que corresponde. No estaba sellado pero ya yo e comprado este producto en walmart ($6 más caro) y también viene sin el sello. Encuanto a mi experiencia usándolo les digo que es lo mejor que e tratado para el acné aunque mi dermatologo me lo ordenó para aclarar las manchas en la piel incluyendo las entre piernas y axilas y me a funcionado muy bien.No lo puedo usar más de 3 veces por semana en la cara por que me la reseca un poco pero en las otras partes del cuerpo si lo uso a diario. Mi piel es normal. Mi doctor me dijo que no puedo usar otro jabón o cremas antes o despues de aplicarlo por que se va el efecto del medicamento. Cuidado que decolora la ropa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bottle not filled all the way.
reviews.reviewText: I order this face wash all the time. I have used it for over a year now and it has been amazing for my acne, however after receiving mine today i noticed it wasn’t very full. I’m not sure if it’s just this bottle that i have received or it’s been the same with my past orders but i just now noticed and i’m disappointed with how much product is not in the bottle. I would understand if that’s just how it is for all bottles but why waste that much plastic making the bottle taller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: So exciting! I have been buying Proactive for 14 YEARS! Its the only thing that ever worked for my youth acne and when I would stop I would get mild break outs, nothing terrible but still undesirable. I tried switching to other drug store brands but they all didnt work. So I would always end up buying Proactive again. I have been out of Proactive for like 3 months and Im really over the breakouts, I was scrolling through the Proactive choices and noticed the "Benzoyl Peroxide" on the front label (never really thought of looking at that.. lol) So I searched it instead found this and ordered it. Whithin 2 days of using it my face is cleared and feeling like it does when I use Proactive! I HAVE BEEN USING PROACTIVE FOR 14 YEARS, its so expensive!! LOL I know how well (Proactive) works for me and how fast it works. And this Benzoyl Peroxide acted just the same, its the key ingredient that my skin needed! I mix it with a little bit of baking soda and it worked so well! I may try looking for face washes specifically that has 10% Benzoyl Peroxide in it or I may just keep using this. But I wanted to share my review as it may save another some money!! YAY!
